member.name: T:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncConfigurations
member.summary: The configurations of the sync agent.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncConfigurations.SyncMode
member.summary: The sync mode that determines which items will be inserted/updated/deleted in the source/destination.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncConfigurations.SyncOperationsOrder
member.summary: The order of the sync operations: Insert, Update, and Delete.

member.name: M:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncConfigurations.Validate
member.summary: Validates the sync configurations.

member.name: M:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncConfigurations.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the configurations of the sync agent.

member.name: T:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncItemOperation
member.summary: The sync operation of an item that does not have a match.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncItemOperation.None
member.summary: Do nothing.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncItemOperation.Add
member.summary: Adds items to other list.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncItemOperation.Delete
member.summary: Deletes items from the current list.

member.name: T:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMatchOperation
member.summary: The sync operation of an item that has a match.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMatchOperation.None
member.summary: Do nothing.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMatchOperation.UpdateSource
member.summary: Updates the source items with the destination items regardless which item is newer.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMatchOperation.UpdateDestination
member.summary: Updates the destination items with the source items regardless which item is newer.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMatchOperation.UpdateOldItem
member.summary: Updates the old items with the new items in either the source or destination.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMatchOperation.UpdateOldDestination
member.summary: Updates the destination items with the source items if they are old.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMatchOperation.UpdateOldSource
member.summary: Updates the source items with the destination items if they are old.

member.name: T:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode
member.summary: The sync mode that determines which items will be inserted/updated/deleted in the source/destination.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode.SyncModePreset
member.summary: Presets for the sync mode to facilitate updating source/destination items.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode.ItemsInSourceOnly
member.summary: Items that exist only in source.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode.ItemsInDestinationOnly
member.summary: Items that exist only in destination.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode.SameMatches
member.summary: Same items that exist in the source and destination.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode.NewerMatches
member.summary: Matches that have either newer source items or newer destination items.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode.ConflictMatches
member.summary: Items that have matches in the other list but could not determine which one is newer.

member.name: M:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncMode.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the sync mode.

member.name: T:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset
member.summary: Presets for the sync mode to facilitate updating source/destination items.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset.None
member.summary: Do nothing.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset.TwoWay
member.summary: Updates the source and the destination to have the same items.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset.MirrorToDestination
member.summary: Updates the destination only to have the same items as in the source and deletes any item in destination that does have a match.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset.MirrorToSource
member.summary: Updates the source only to have the same items as in the destination and deletes any item in source that does have a match.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset.UpdateDestination
member.summary: Updates the destination items only to have the same items as in the source. It does not delete any item from the destination and it does not update conflicts.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset.UpdateSource
member.summary: Updates the source items only to have the same items as in the destination. It does not delete any item from the source and it does not update conflicts.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncModePreset.Custom
member.summary: Custom sync mode that is not similar to any other presets.

member.name: T:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationsOrder
member.summary: The order of the sync operations: Insert, Update, and Delete.

member.name: P:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationsOrder.Order
member.summary: The order of the sync operations: Insert, Update, and Delete.

member.name: M:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationsOrder.HasDuplicates
member.summary: Checks for duplicates in the order array.

member.name: M:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationsOrder.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the order of the sync operations: Insert, Update, and Delete.

member.name: T:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationType
member.summary: The type of the sync operation.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationType.Insert
member.summary: The insert operation.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationType.Update
member.summary: The update operation.

member.name: F:FluentSync.Sync.Configurations.SyncOperationType.Delete
member.summary: The delete operation.

member.name: M:FluentSync.ValueTypeExtensions.CompareTo``1(System.Nullable{``0},System.Nullable{``0})
member.summary: Compares the null-able x object with the null-able y object.
member.typeparam: The type of the x and y objects.
member.param: The x object.
The y object.
member.returns: A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning Less than zero This instance precedes other in the sort order. Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as other. Greater than zero This instance follows other in the sort order.
